name: Blue's Runback
description:
BlueLizardJello is a YouTube content creator. He has guided many people through various souls games with his "Everything possible in ..... " series while being entertaining and family friendly. Without him, my appreciation of souls games wouldn't be nearly as strong as it is now. 

(Link: https://www.youtube.com/c/ItsBlueLizardJello)

As a small thank you for how much work you put into this, I made you this little game. 

If you like the art, you can download it bellow in a .zip file. Thanks for playing.
